body.p: However, the Board was concerned that:

li.p: the regulatory requirements in different jurisdictions may result in similar entities qualifying as an investment entity in one jurisdiction but not in another;
regulatory requirements may change over time, resulting in an ever-changing population of entities that would be eligible for an exception to consolidation; and
it would have no control over which entities would qualify for the exception to consolidation.

body.p: Consequently, the Board decided not to reference regulatory requirements in the definition of an investment entity.
